title: From Now On......
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Great job on the joint event! That was awesome!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Mhmm, that was soooo much fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah...... I just hope that I was able to make everyone happy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Don’t worry, Ayumu-chan. Didn’t you see everyone’s smiles when you were on stage?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I know, right?! I’m sure everyone had tons of fun. Ayumu-chan, did you have fun?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I had so much fun! And it was nice to meet everyone.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I know, right?! I want to hold events where we can meet everyone more often!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Same! We’ll have to work even harder for that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I want even more people to know how amazing school idols are!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Alright then, let’s gather everyone and start practicing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
